reference.title: (MySqlMonitor) MySQL Database Monitor
reference.shortdesc: The ZenPacks.zenoss.MySqlMonitor ZenPack monitors MySQL database servers through the Python twisted.enterprise.adbapi asynchronous framework.

section.note: Release 4.2.5 of includes version 3.x of this ZenPack, which collects data through a customized modeler plugin. If you have upgraded from an earlier release, see .
section.p: This ZenPack provides the following features.

ul.li: Monitoring of MySQL Server and Database components
Event management and monitoring for certain MySQL states
